titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the well ordering and setling the manufacture of soape, vnder a rule and gouernment
Proclamations. 1635-01-25
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Enforcing the Soapmakers' Co. monopoly, especially the right to search for lees prepared for making soap."--STC.
The year in the title is according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
